title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 316.3 - Authority to execute contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 316.3 - Authority to execute contracts

State Regulations

The State University Board of Trustees has authorized the
chancellor, and the chancellor's designees on the State University system
administration staff, as well as chief administrative officers at

State-operated campuses and their duly appointed designees, to execute specific
types of contracts, revocable permits and agreements for and in the chancellor'
s name, place and stead, in accordance with guidelines to be issued by the
chancellor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
316.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
